questions.question: Your company is trying to decide between using on-demand or provisioned resources for their machine learning (ML) workloads. What is the main difference between the two, in terms of performance and scaling?
options: On-demand resources can scale up and down instantly, whereas provisioned resources have a fixed capacity and can take time to scale.
Provisioned resources have better performance than on-demand resources.
On-demand resources are more cost-effective for short-term, unpredictable workloads, whereas provisioned resources are better for long-term, predictable workloads.
Provisioned resources can scale up and down instantly, whereas on-demand resources have a fixed capacity.
correct_answers: On-demand resources are more cost-effective for short-term, unpredictable workloads, whereas provisioned resources are better for long-term, predictable workloads.
